documentation.text: Creates {@code Option} objects describing a single command-line option by maintaining information regarding the short-name, the long-name, a flag indicating if an argument is required, and a self-documenting description.
Number of argument values the option can take.
Query to see if the option is required.
Query to see if the option can have an optional argument.
Display name for the argument value of the option.

template.text: Identifier of the model to process.
Classpath elements separated by ''{0}''. If starting with a ''@'' character, a file name of a file holding classpath elements.
Klassenpfad-Elemente mit ''{0}'' getrennt. Wenn mit ''@'' beginnend, Dateiname einer Textdatei mit Klassenpfad-Elementen.
Document filenames separated by ''{0}''. If starting with a ''@'' character, a file name of a file holding document filenames.
Dokument-Dateinamen mit ''{0}'' getrennt. Wenn mit ''@'' beginnend, Dateiname einer Textdatei mit Dokument-Dateinamen.
Name of the module to process.
Directory to write resource files to.
Verzeichnis, in das Ressource-Dateien geschrieben werden sollen.
Directory holding the source files to manage.
Verzeichnis, in dem sich die zu verwaltenden Quelltextdateien befinden.
Location to search for templates in addition to searching the class path of the application.
Ort, an dem zusätzlich zum Klassenpfad der Anwendung nach Vorlagen gesucht werden soll.
Directory holding the class files to process.
Verzeichnis, in dem sich die zu verarbeitenden Klassendateien befinden.
Name of the file to write the document to.
Name der Datei, in die das Dokument geschrieben werden soll.
Encoding of the document to write.
Name of a XSLT file to use for transforming documents.
Name einer XSLT Datei, mit der Dokumente transformiert werden sollen.
Module names separated by ''{0}'' of modules to include.
Module names separated by ''{0}'' of modules to exclude.
Line separator. (''\r\n'' for DOS, ''\r'' for Mac, ''\n'' for Unix). Defaults to the system''s line separator.
Zeilenvorschub. (''\r\n'' für DOS, ''\r'' für Mac, ''\n'' für Unix). Verwendet standardmäßig den System-Zeilenvorschub.
Name of the modlet to create.
Modlet names separated by ''{0}'' of modlets to include.
Modlet names separated by ''{0}'' of modlets to exclude.
Identifier of the implementation to process.
Identifier of the specification to process.
Class name of the ''ClassFileProcessor'' to use.
Class name of the ''ResourceFileProcessor'' to use.
Class name of the ''SourceFileProcessor'' to use.
Class name of the ''ModelContext'' to use.
Resource names separated by ''{0}'' of resources to include.

dependency.name: CommandLineParser
dependency.implementationName: Commons CLI - GNU Command Line Parser

documentation.text: The number of characters per line for the usage statement.
The number of characters of padding to be prefixed to each line.
The number of characters of padding to be prefixed to each description line.
The name of the command used to request help.

template.text: Geben Sie »jomc <Befehl> {0}« für weitere Informationen ein.
Illegal arguments. Type »jomc {0} {1}« for further information.
Ungültige Argumente. Geben Sie »jomc {0} {1}« für weitere Informationen ein.

implementation.identifier: Commons CLI - Basic Command Line Parser
implementation.name: Commons CLI - Basic Command Line Parser

documentation.text: The BasicParser provides a very simple implementation of the flatten method.

implementation.identifier: Commons CLI - GNU Command Line Parser
implementation.name: Commons CLI - GNU Command Line Parser

documentation.text: The GnuParser provides an implementation of the flatten method.

implementation.identifier: Commons CLI - Posix Command Line Parser
implementation.name: Commons CLI - Posix Command Line Parser

documentation.text: The PosixParser provides an implementation of the flatten method.
List of providers to exclude from any {@code META-INF/services} file separated by {@code :}.
List of schema context-ids to exclude from any {@code META-INF/jomc-modlet.xml} file separated by {@code :}.
List of service classes to exclude from any {@code META-INF/jomc-modlet.xml} file separated by {@code :}.
List of modlet names to exclude from any {@code META-INF/jomc-modlet.xml} file separated by {@code :}.

template.text: Classpath element ''{0}'' ignored. File not found.
Document file ''{0}'' ignored. File not found.
Provider ''{1}'' from class path resource ''{0}'' ignored.
Service ''{1}'' from class path resource ''{0}'' ignored.
Context ''{1}'' from class path resource ''{0}'' ignored.
Modlet ''{1}'' from class path resource ''{0}'' ignored.

Example: jomc generate-resources -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -rd /tmp/rsrc \ -df examples/xml/jomc-cli.xml \ -mn "JOMC CLI" \ -v
jomc manage-sources -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -sd /tmp/src \ -df examples/xml/jomc-cli.xml \ -mn "JOMC CLI" \ -tp "jomc-cli-bundles" \ -tl "examples/vm" \ -v

Beispiel: jomc generate-resources -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -rd /tmp/rsrc \ -df examples/xml/jomc-cli.xml \ -mn "JOMC CLI" \ -v
jomc manage-sources -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -sd /tmp/src \ -df examples/xml/jomc-cli.xml \ -mn "JOMC CLI" \ -tp "jomc-cli-bundles" \ -tl "examples/vm" \ -v
Example: jomc manage-sources -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -sd /tmp/src \ -df examples/xml/jomc-cli.xml \ -mn "JOMC CLI" \ -tp "jomc-cli" \ -tl "examples/vm" \ -v
Beispiel: jomc manage-sources -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -sd /tmp/src \ -df examples/xml/jomc-cli.xml \ -mn "JOMC CLI" \ -tp "jomc-cli" \ -tl "examples/vm" \ -v
Commits model objects to class files.
Example: jomc commit-classes -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -df examples/xml/jomc-cli.xml \ -cd target/classes \ -mn "JOMC CLI" \ -v
Beispiel: jomc commit-classes -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -df examples/xml/jomc-cli.xml \ -cd target/classes \ -mn "JOMC CLI" \ -v
Validates model objects of class files.
Example: jomc merge-modules -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -df examples/xml/jomc-cli.xml \ -xs examples/xslt/model-relocations.xsl \ -mn "Merged Name" \ -d /tmp/jomc.xml \ -v
Beispiel: jomc merge-modules -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -df examples/xml/jomc-cli.xml \ -xs examples/xslt/model-relocations.xsl \ -mn "Merged Name" \ -d /tmp/jomc.xml \ -v
Example: jomc merge-modlets -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -xs examples/xslt/modlet-relocations.xsl \ -mdn "Merged Name" \ -d /tmp/jomc-modlet.xml \ -v
Beispiel: jomc merge-modlets -cp examples/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar \ -xs examples/xslt/modlet-relocations.xsl \ -mdn "Merged Name" \ -d /tmp/jomc-modlet.xml \ -v
Failure transforming result document using ''{0}''. Illegal transformation result.
Fehler bei der Transformation des Ergebniss-Dokuments mit ''{0}''. Ungültiges Transformations-Ergebniss.
